pr_title: chore(broker): split snapshot replication destination folders

timeline.message:
chore(broker): split snapshot replication destination folders

- splits destination folders for the different snapshot replications as
  they run in different thread context and both need to modify the same
  on-disk state
- Atomix snapshot replication will now write to raft-pending/ folder
- Zeebe snapshot replication will now write to pushed-pending/ folder

replies.bodyText: It now only does for the one pending directory it knows about - do you think it should also purge this one as well? I'm also not sure if it's a good idea for it do it anyway, because purgeSnapshots can be called from different thread contexts, so we might still run into the issue of deleting on going replications? Though it should be more fault tolerant
replies.author: npepinpe

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I missed that DbSnapshot is shared between raft and atomix. Then it make sense to cleanup here. But then wouldn't we cleanup raft-pending snapshot while we purge snapshots here?
replies.author: deepthidevaki

chore(qa): fix potential race condition in tests

- changes waitForNewSnapshot from waiting until a new snapshot is
  committed without waiting for the older ones to be removed to
  wait until a new snapshot has been committed AND the previous ones
  removed; this fixes a potential race conditions when asserting the
  checksum of available snapshots in tests
